statements: SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT status, delivery_date FROM transactions WHERE processed = TRUE
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transactions WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transactions WHERE processed = true;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, status, amount FROM transactions WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status='success';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, status FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 AND status='pending' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_status WHERE delivery_date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC, current_location ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transactions JOIN delivery_status ON transactions.transaction_id = delivery_status.transaction_id WHERE delivery_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM transaction_status ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer.name, product.name FROM customer JOIN product ON customer.customer_id = '321e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transaction_status WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_status JOIN customer ON transaction_status.transaction_id = customer.customer_id;

SELECT product.product_id, product.name, transaction_status.status FROM product JOIN transaction_status ON product.product_id = transaction_status.transaction_id WHERE transaction_status.status = 'failed';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_status WHERE status = 'delivered' AND delivery_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_time, status FROM transactions WHERE status IN ('success', 'pending') ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT transaction_time, status FROM transactions WHERE status='completed';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, status, customer_id, product_id FROM deliveries WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, status, amount FROM transactions WHERE settlement_date IS NULL AND amount >= 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY last_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT delivery_date, status, product_name FROM deliveries d JOIN products p ON d.product_id = p.product_id WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC LIMIT 20;
